ac.name: AC Power Section
ac.description: AC power measurements including input and output characteristics

input_freq.name: AC Input Frequency
input_freq.description: The frequency of the incoming AC power supply

input_voltage.name: AC Input Voltage
input_voltage.description: Voltage level of the incoming AC power supply

output_freq.name: AC Output Frequency
output_freq.description: Frequency of the inverter's AC output power

output_load_percent.name: Output Load Percentage
output_load_percent.description: Percentage of maximum load capacity currently being used

power_factor.name: AC power Factor
power_factor.description: Ratio of the load that is resistive

output_voltage.name: AC Output Voltage
output_voltage.description: Voltage level of the inverter's AC output

output_watts.name: Output Real Power
output_watts.description: Actual power consumption in watts (real power)

pv_current.name: Solar PV Current
pv_current.description: Current output from photovoltaic solar panels

pv_voltage.name: Solar PV Voltage
pv_voltage.description: Voltage output from photovoltaic solar panels

pv_power.name: Solar PV Power
pv_power.description: Instantaneous power generation from solar panels

pv_energy_produced.name: Solar Energy Produced
pv_energy_produced.description: Cumulative energy generated by solar panels

dc.name: DC Power Section
dc.description: Direct current measurements including battery, solar, and charging parameters

batt_v_compensation_k.name: Battery Voltage Compensation Factor
batt_v_compensation_k.description: Compensation coefficient for battery voltage readings

charge_current.name: Battery Charge Current
charge_current.description: Current flowing into the battery during charging

charge_power.name: Battery Charge Power
charge_power.description: Power being delivered to the battery during charging

discharge_current.name: Battery Discharge Current
discharge_current.description: Current flowing out of the battery during discharge

discharge_power.name: Battery Discharge Power
discharge_power.description: Power being drawn from the battery during discharge

voltage.name: Battery Voltage
voltage.description: The raw voltage measurement of the battery bank

voltage_corrected.name: Corrected Battery Voltage
voltage_corrected.description: Battery voltage adjusted with compensation factor

inverter.name: Inverter System Section
inverter.description: Inverter/charger system status, settings, and operational parameters

read_interval_ms.name: Data Read Interval
read_interval_ms.description: Time between sensor data readings in milliseconds

valid_info.name: Data Validity Flag
valid_info.description: Indicates whether current readings are valid (1) or not (0)

charger.name: Charger Status
charger.description: Current state/status of the battery charging system

eff_w.name: Real Power Efficiency
eff_w.description: Efficiency calculation based on real power

op_mode.name: Operating Mode
op_mode.description: Current operating mode of the inverter/charger system

soc.name: State of Charge
soc.description: Battery charge level expressed as a percentage

temp.name: Inverter Temperature
temp.description: Internal temperature of the inverter unit

read_time.name: Last Read Time
read_time.description: Time taken for the most recent data read operation

read_time_mean.name: Average Read Time
read_time_mean.description: Average time taken for data read operations

battery_energy.name: Battery Energy Content
battery_energy.description: Estimated energy stored in the battery bank

energy_spent_ac.name: AC Energy Consumed
energy_spent_ac.description: Cumulative energy consumed from AC output

energy_source_ac.name: AC Source Percentage
energy_source_ac.description: Percentage of output power sourced from AC input

energy_source_batt.name: Battery Source Percentage
energy_source_batt.description: Percentage of output power sourced from battery

energy_source_pv.name: Solar Source Percentage
energy_source_pv.description: Percentage of output power sourced from solar panels

autonomy.name: Battery Autonomy
autonomy.description: Estimated remaining runtime in minutes based on current consumption and battery energy

uptime.name: System Uptime
uptime.description: Time since system startup in minutes
